title: Assessment and Feedback Design Strategies in Remote Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational college-level mathematics and experience with VR simulation tools
context.additional_context: Requires integration of flexible time management and real-time/asynchronous assessment methods for learners comprising working professionals

learning_goals: Learners can perform math problem-solving projects in a VR simulation environment and submit revised solutions incorporating peer/instructor feedback.
Learners can diagnose conceptual understanding through weekly formative assessments (quizzes, mock experiments) and create remedial learning plans.
Learners enhance collaborative skills by self-assessing project outcomes and providing feedback according to a clear evaluation rubric.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
